sentences.sContent: In approximately 1925, work began on the problem of suspension .
sentences.sContent_eng: In approximately 1925, work began on the problem of suspension .
sentences.sCn: 大约在1925年才开始了关于悬移质的研究。

sentences.sContent: Can you supply this quality at approximately 50% cents per meter?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you supply this quality at approximately 50% cents per meter?
sentences.sCn: 请问你们是否能够提供这种质量的，大约每米50%分？

sentences.sContent: This is certainly true for a plane mirror but it is only approximately the case for other configurations .
sentences.sContent_eng: This is certainly true for a plane mirror but it is only approximately the case for other configurations .
sentences.sCn: 对于平面镜这肯定是对的，但是对于其它形状的反射镜则情况只是近似如此。

words.tran: [数] 近似法；接近；[数] 近似值
